author: sky.cactus
content: Are networking charts CL only, or do they include El?  Disk charts obviously are CL only because EL is orders of magnitude more than chart shows, but unclear for the networking charts.  For networking purposes, is the CL and El assumed to be on the same host in all tests?

author: stefa2k.eth
content:
<@798785877815459891>  <@301186049323958275> 

With StereumLabs we run EL and CL on separate VMs, so EL and CL traffic is explicitly visible and measurable (incl. cross-client communication, different network interfaces in our runs).
We’re running all client combinations (currently 36 EC/CC pairs), which lets us observe bandwidth, disk and resource behavior across releases and configs, both for classic full nodes and supernode setups.
The goal isn’t to recommend clients, but to make the actual requirements and trade-offs measurable instead of theoretical.
If you want to poke around yourselves, there’s a free tier available and documentation around metrics and dashboards. Happy to clarify details here as well.
